chat.web.bean

Class AdministrationBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • chat.web.bean.AdministrationBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @Named(value="administrationBean")
 @ViewScoped
public class AdministrationBean
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This managed bean supports the operations and UI components of the administration page.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
